Interpolation method for Tmin and Tmax points is linear
The control python file is ek062-4
The raw_olis data file is ek062-4
The raw_ftir data file is ek062-4
The sub_olis data file is BareSapphire3b
The sub_ftir data file is sapphire 3 matt
Column 1-2: raw data (x,y), Column 3-4 fitted line (x,y)
x = n/lambda [*1e-3 in 1/nm], y = l/2 [arb. units] where l=0,1,2...
